messages.content: What is the purpose of the comfyui-Image-reward plugin?
The comfyui-Image-reward plugin collaborates with mixlab-nodes to convert workflows into apps in ComfyUI.
ImageReward is a human preference learning model in text-to-image generation. It is trained using the large-scale dataset ImageRewardDB consisting of approximately 137,000 comparison pairs.
For which conference was the ImageReward paper submitted?
The ImageReward paper was submitted for NeurIPS 2023.
What are the installation requirements for comfyui-Image-reward?
The installation requirements for comfyui-Image-reward are listed in the requirement.txt file.
Where should the ImageReward model files be placed?
The ImageReward model files should be placed in ComfyUI/models/image_reward/, with ImageReward.pt and med_config.json files.
Which BERT model is used by comfyui-Image-reward?
The comfyui-Image-reward plugin uses the bert-base-uncased model from Google.
Where should the bert-base-uncased model files be placed for comfyui-Image-reward?
The bert-base-uncased model files should be placed in the ComfyUI/models/image_reward/bert-base-uncased/ directory.
